title: Why am I downloading the entire game with this patch? 3 gigs?

replies.body: It looks like your current version already shows as the 7.15, so this could be the result of a repair.  The client may have detected some corrupt files after your update, and working to fix them now.  As long as your connection is solid, you should be in the clear in no time!
Okay thanks! I thought it was re doing the entire game and I would lose all my set hot keys and stuff.
Not worry, settings like bindings are saved server side!

How is there a way to find out if it is due to corrupt files? Your saying that once those files are fixed it will finish up pretty quick but I've been waiting for 2 hours now and its still not clearing itself up. I know I have a solid connection and have gone through all the guides for connectivity that have been provided. I don't understand why I'm having this issue and I feel like after I wait a few more hours to let it finish its gonna have some kind of issue and make me restart
